mapper.select: SELECT b.*, w.writername as writername, p.paymentdate as paymentdate FROM book b INNER JOIN writer w ON b.writerno = w.writerno INNER JOIN bookpayment bp ON b.bookno = bp.bookno INNER JOIN payment p ON bp.paymentno = p.paymentno ORDER BY b.bookno ASC

SELECT b.BOOKNO,b.BOOKPRICE ,b.BOOKTITLE ,to_char(b.BOOKPDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS BOOKPDATE ,b.BOOKSYNO,b.BOOKIMG ,b.BOOKCONTENT ,b.BOOKAUDIO ,b.BOOKSUB ,b.CATEGORYNO ,c.CATEGORYNAME,c2.COMPANYNAME , w.WRITERNAME , w.WRITERDETAIL FROM book b INNER JOIN CATEGORY c ON b.CATEGORYNO=c.CATEGORYNO INNER JOIN COMPANY c2 ON b.COMPANYNO=c2.COMPANYNO INNER JOIN WRITER w ON b.WRITERNO=w.WRITERNO WHERE b.bookno=#{bookNo}
